metadata.title: How to make web development learning more practical and relevant? - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership
metadata.description: Inteli research presented at IEEE ICEED 2024 shows how PBL makes teaching web development more practical, collaborative and connected to the market.

content_blocks.text: Inteli>Graduation>How to make learning web development more practical and relevant?
How can we make learning web development more practical and relevant?

- 1 Sep 2025
- Henrique Mohallem Paiva
- 1 Sep 2025
content_blocks.section: How can we make learning web development more practical and relevant?

content_blocks.text: The research presented atIEEE ICEED 2024, conducted by myself, professor and academic directorFlavia Santoro, and studentVin√≠cius Kumagai, investigated the effectiveness ofProject-Based Learning (PBL)in teaching web development, by creating an application aimed at hiring construction professionals.
content_blocks.section: How can we make learning web development more practical and relevant?

content_blocks.text: Conducted over ten weeks in an academic context focused on technology, the research assessed howPBL impacts technical training and student confidence.
content_blocks.section: How can we make learning web development more practical and relevant?

content_blocks.text: The results showed that by working on real projects, students not only improved their programming and interface design skills, but also developed essential competencies such as collaboration, problem-solving and greater autonomy. In addition, they reported increased engagement and a greater connection between theory and practice.
content_blocks.section: How can we make learning web development more practical and relevant?

content_blocks.text: The study reinforces the importance of active methodologies in higher education, showing that practical experiences are fundamental to preparing more complete professionals who are aligned with the real demands of the technology market. Find out morehere.
content_blocks.section: How can we make learning web development more practical and relevant?
